body.text: evaṃ mayā śrutam - ekasmin samaye bhagavān buddhaḥ sāgaranāgarājāvasathe viharati sma sārddhaṃ sārdhadvādaśaśatabhikṣūṇāṃ mahāsaṅghena bahubhiśca bodhisattvamahāsattvaiḥ / tasmin samaye bhagavān buddhaḥ sāgaranāgarājamavocat - nāgādhipate, caturṇāṃ dharmoddānānāmabhidhāne kriyamāṇe tadabhidhānena caturaśītidharmaskandhasahasrāṇāmabhidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati / katamāni catvāri? tathāhi -
nāgādhipate, eteṣāṃ caturṇāṃ dharmoddānānāmabhidhāne kriyamāṇe tadabhidhānena caturaśītidharmaskandhasahasrāṇāmabhidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati /
idamavocat bhagavān / āttamanaso bhikṣavaḥ sarve ca bodhisattvā bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti /
